View_And_Edit_User_Profile_Page.disable_user_page_title: Confirm to disable user of sponsor organisation - Sponsor organisation profile - System administration - Plan and manage health and care research
View_And_Edit_User_Profile_Page.disable_sub_heading: Disable user from this sponsor organisation
View_And_Edit_User_Profile_Page.disable_guidance_text: Disabling this user will stop them from working under this sponsor organisation and can be reversed.
View_And_Edit_User_Profile_Page.enable_user_page_title: Confirm to enable user of sponsor organisation - Sponsor organisation profile - System administration - Plan and manage health and care research
View_And_Edit_User_Profile_Page.enable_sub_heading: Enable user for this sponsor organisation
View_And_Edit_User_Profile_Page.enable_guidance_text: Enabling this user will allow them to work under this sponsor organisation and can be reversed.

Disable_Label_Texts.disable_guidance_text: Disabling this user will stop them from working under this sponsor organisation and can be reversed.
